1.content:
How does this adventure begin?

1. Cute girl charged with protecting the masks finds you

2. Find the masks in your attic

3. Find a spell to create masks

4. Follow the POV of a girl being masked

5. Something else
1.title: Before We Start...

choices: Try it on a Guy? (Priscilla warned you not to try this, or "Or Else")
11.content:
You were sitting around lounging on your bottom when suddenly a portal through space and time opened up. You got up and were almost blown back, but held on and stared in long enough to see a person pop out. It was a girl, she looked to be about your age, only with dark tanned skin, purple hair, a hat that a harlequin would wear, and a fruity purple-green leotard and uniform that looked like something resembling magical girl's fuku. She had a cute staff with a pink crystal skull at the end, and bowed to you and lugged a bag over her shoulder.

"Who are you?" You ask, somewhat scared but also intrigued.

She smiles and taps the staff over your shoulder.

"You may call me Priscilla. I am here to reward you and appoint you as the official Grand Couturier, to be an envoy, and herald of the Masked red queen. I have been tasked with protecting these cursed mask, however. She has seen you to be fit for this job, and you shall be the one to distribute and share them with proper host."

You stare dumbstuck as she reaches into her bag. It's filled with a whole bundle of elaborate, fancy, eye-catching mask!

Some look like white carnival mask, some have makeup or pretty feminine designs. Others are furry or look like animals or mythical beast and monsters. Some even resemble skulls or muscles, and are downright terrifying. There are many varied mask, mask that are cute, scary, pretty, strong, mysterious, and all seem to share none but their own design and come with their own sort of feeling to them.

She sits down and tells you about her role in making these mask and their ability to control and warp people. They once were the spirits of living people, but those who cursed their fate, blessed the gods, or were met with memorable and powerful ends, had their last wills cast as curses, reflecting back into these mask. Each one has it's own story and properties, but mainly whoever puts them on will change drastically, and also become obedient to who assigns them their mask. Originally this would be her, Priscilla or the Red Queen, but since the Queen is much too busy and her too curious, she is assigning you as their owners. That means whoever you give the mask to, will obey you and their powers and changes will be yours to command. However, Priscilla gives you a wag of the finger that the mask have uncontrollable and often unpredictable effects, and you should ask about and think carefully for each one and who you assign them to. They only are wearable on females, "Or else", and once they're worn will either change or eventually fully consume and overwrite the wearers mind. After telling you good luck, she warns you that she'll be keeping an eye on you, and not to ever try on a mask yourself or there will be horrible consequences.


When you finally say you understand, she hands you the bag of masks. After chanting some mystic words and putting her hand over your head, you feel a shock of energy blast through you. With a giggle and wave, she leaves and wishes you well, floating back through her portal, presumably to report back to the Red Queen.

Once she's gone, you pick up a mask and can feel and see it's aura, like it's power is radiating out. Instinctively, you know if you share it, whoever becomes this mask's host will become your servant, yet absorb the properties of the mask.

Smiling, you wonder who you should test your new gifts on first. You already have the perfect target in mind.
11.title: Guardian of the Masks

111.content:
You sneak up on your sister, who is doodling and coloring in her little book like kids have been known to do. She's innocently scribbling some sort of princess. As far as you get however, she catches you in the act. "I told you to stay out of my room!" She yells, throwing her crayola crown at you. You ignore it and scoot by her.

"Oh sister of mine, I've got the most adorable thing to share with you! Don't you want to play dress up?" You say, sneaking closer to her and tugging your mask with slight difficulty overhead. You pull out the bag and show it in front of her, and her eyes light up as she sees the assortment of face accessories that she could put on. Before she can reach in and put one on however, you snatch the bag away and tell her you have a rule.

"I'm going to be picking out a mask for you okay? What ever I give you, you have to wear and not object. After I have my fun, I'll give you a turn and try on whatever you want." You tell her, knowing you won't need to give her a second.

She thinks about it for a moment and hums, agreeing as she leans back with glee. You look through the bag yourself, excited that you've got her in her clutches. She won't ever have a choice, you'll have your first host of the cursed mask in a moment.

Pulling through it, you take out and give her a mask of..

1)An elegant, refined mask with diamonds and goat horns

2)A pink, pretty porcelain looking fairy mask

3)A dirty, scary mask of some kind of Ghost
111.title: Your little sister

1112.content:
"Oooh, am I going to wear that! It's so pretty!" Your sister chirps, clapping her hands slightly and rocking in glee as you show it to her. It has purple swirls, yellow hearts, and pink flowers decorated on it. The eye slits are rather sharp and it has a small, cute little nose and bee-stung shaped lips. Strands of lemon blond hair curl out behind it, and the strap itself for the mask is a silky pink ribbon. You hand her the mask, and ask of her to step back and put it on slowly, and than the fun can begin.

She ignores your last cryptic comment, and and slowly leans back, pulling it closer to her face. As if out of a cartoon, the back of the mask burst into light and white-goop, wrapping itself around her face and head. She attempts to pull it off reflexively as it clings to her face and smothers her mouth and airholes. Nudging and shaking her head, her thrashing and struggling slowly came to a stop as the mask melted once more, becoming flesh like and spreading, melting and covering the rest of her body.

She looked like she was wrapped in a pale white rubber cocoon for a moment. You watch carefully, as smooth cracks and folds appear in her form, slowly shaping out as her whole body is remade, like white clay putty being re-sculpted. Once it's finished, the light and crackling fades and you finally get a glimpse of your new sister, standing ready and rearing for your orders.

Your newly-masked sister has become...
1112.title: She puts on the Fairy mask

11123.content: She has become a very slender looking sylph. She had grown breasts that were a b cup, which you thought was odd for someone her age. As you continue to look, you also notice that your sisters clothes have changed into something more sylph-like. Before you get a chance to look at anything else however, she starts to speak to.
11123.title: unusual transformation

choices: Show it to a family member

You pick up the box and place it in the open space behind you, you look on the lid to which at your suprise has your name on it! You cannot ignore this mysterious box, you know it’s wrong but you don’t care, you open it up and there lays a pile of different masks of shapes, figures, sizes and colors. “Woahh this is cool man” you say aloud, you pick up one of the masks and..

121.content: You see underneath the instructions for the masks it reads “the first person to make contact with these masks will be their master until passed on to the next generation, the masks take control of the host when placed on the face of the person u want to be part of your harem. Enjoy, but not too much ;) oh and by the way the entities are females so I don’t recommend using these on you know, men! Good luck”. “Woah woah” you stammer struggling to apprehend all that, “there’s no way this is real”, “well I guess there’s only one way to know for sure, time to get some girls mwhahah”. But who??
121.title: See underneath an instruction manual

121311.content:
You see her sat on a chair in class she is sat at the back and the teacher has walked out the room to go collect something.
You sneak round the table at the side of her unnoticed and pull out the mask with an angel like face and devil horns.
You undo the strap at the back getting ready to attach it to her face.
Charlotte wears heavy red lipstick and her double d breast bulge in her shirt as it is too small for her.
Her skirt is always too small but no one seems to complain.
She flirts with most of the hot lads in the school and is around 5’8.
You walk up behind her and grasp her mouth shut so no one will notice if she tries to shout.
You place the mask over her face and it begins to glow and Charlotte shakes violently as she slumps back in her chair and then all of a sudden the mask sinks into her face and Charlotte immediately sat up and faced you.
You thought for a moment she might be pretending and about to hit you however this was not the case.
She began to say “hello master, I am here to serve you”
“Woah” you say silently
“What powers do you have” you ask the new Charlotte.
“I can do many things master I can transform my current form to certain extents, I can give Charlotte back and come back again whenever u ask, I can also change my personality to your needs”
“Holy crap” you say
“So master what do you want me to do first” Charlotte says with a mischievous look in her eye.
121311.title: Try and force a mask on her

12132.content:
You see Maddie walking to her lesson when she walks down the wrong hallway.
“Maddie!” You shout “come here I’ve got something to show you”
Maddie walked over slowly you can see her boobs bulging out her shirt and her skirt almost up her arse.
“What is it?” Said Maddie nervously
“Just look”
James pulled out a mask with a devil face on it and a smile that spelled trouble
Maddie looked at it inquisitively
Then all of sudden when Maddie looked it dead in the eyes and the masks eyes glowed red.

Master” she said

151.content: What connection to the Master?
151.title: The Search Begins

choices: Try one of the masks on.
Call a friend over for advice.
Try to get someone else to wear a mask
152.content:
The shop in front of you is open, but you hesitate. That it has come this far is something that you still can't comprehend. Oh not the second hand shop you are standing in front, you often had to buy stuff there. But this time you are looking for things to help you vacate your apartment. Your are between jobs, aka unemployed and your landlord is throwing you out, no longer willing to wait for your rent.

On the one hand you understand her, you are barely able to buy food, so paying her is out of the question. On the other it's totally unfair. It's not your fault that the brat of the boss has been doing shady business and the firm went down because of it. Your involuntary involvement has made finding a job in your trade difficult, so now, that you are in the worst possible situation, she puts her foot down. Your parents keep telling you to come back and that they'll help you get back on your feet, but that makes your failure even worse.

You sigh and walk inside, looking for a large and sturdy suitcase and a large sports-bag. At least your landlord agreed to pay for your furniture and to give back your deposit, she certainly doesn't have to do that. In fact, it is quite difficult to be angry with her in general. That just leaves you to be angry with yourself.

The search is short and uneventful. You find what you look for, though the only suitcase large enough and within your budget doesn't look like it'll hold together for much longer. Beggars, however, can't be choosers and you buy it anyway, after opening it and making sure that it isn't going to fall apart instantly. You are satisfied and pay. The way home feels really long, but soon you arrive.

Once inside you open the suitcase and prepare to fill it with your belongings. Only that won't work. As soon as you open it you notice that it is utterly full. You KNOW that you checked it beforehand and that it was empty. Now there are dozens of compartments, ordered by alphabet much like in a dictionary. You flip towards a random one and are struck speechless.

There are masks inside! Incredibly detailed rubber masks!

You flip through the compartments and realize that there are dozens of times more compartments than should fit inside the suitcase. That doesn't even account for the masks. There are all manner of them there: Beautiful women, anthropomorphic furry masks, downright monstrous ones. The only thing they all seem to have in common is that they are decidedly feminine, even if the creepier masks are not something you'd call ladylike.
152.title: You find the masks in a shop

choices: These are nice, but not for me
I'm not interested, but I know someone who might be.
1523.content:
Your first thought is to maybe sell all these mask. They look really well made and since there doesn't seem to be an end to them. But at the same time, it seems like an incredibly mundane solution to something clearly supernatural. Still, you really needed the money. So with a queasy feeling you call Ms. Williams, the owner of your apartmentcomplex. Maybe she'd like to buy and wear these lifelike masks.

"Hello Julia Williams here." here voice answers.

"Hi, it's me James Miller. I may have found a way to pay my rent. Well, that is if you'll like to buy something very odd from me..." your voice trails off at the end, realising how lame it sounded.

"Oh James," she sighed, having heard and suffered through more than one of your ideas. "Well, I can at least come and look at it."

You two quickly wrap up the phone call and she tells you that she'll be around in half an hour. She lives in the same complex as you do, but as the owner hers is a sprawling penthouse which even includes and indoor pool. Despite being so rich, she is incredibly kind of patient. Quite unlike her late father who, according to rumours, was exactly the kind of cutthroat and barely legal business man people imagine when they think of 'shady real estate deals'.

You use the time to tidy up your small apartment and start brewing tea, something Ms. Williams really enjoyed. You're barely finished when your doorbell rings. Immediately you go and let her in. Ms. Williams is into her 50s and with her greying hair, wrinkles and simple attire looks more like a kindly grandmother than a rich and powerful heiress. She wasn't very attractive, but she wasn't ugly either, and well, not all heiresses could look like Paris Hilton. Add to that her short stature and large weight and nobody would think of her as someone who has been a tough as nails lawyer. You always respected her for that, especially because every second client of hers would be someone who couldn't normally afford any lawyer, let alone one like her. The two of you exchange greetings and then you lead her into the room and show her the suitcase with the masks.

"Those do look very nice, James" she says and starts browsing the suitcase. "They feel very real, like actual faces. And I wonder how you made it look like the suitcase is endless."

"Eh, trade secret," you lie. Once she looks up with a sceptical glance you quickly add, "Do you like them or anyone in particular?"

She takes out a mask and says
1523.title: Try to get someone else to wear a mask

1551.title: Broader Selection

info.brief_description: Magic masks control others, but answer to you
info.description:
You come across a collection of magic masks, with the power to transform and control their wearer. You discover that the masks exist to serve you. Use the masks to build a collective of followers.

Rules:
-You cannot be controlled by the masks
-Masks are eternally loyal
-Mask entities are female
-Dominant mask entities completely replace the wearer's mind
-Passive mask entities only edit their mind
